00072                         $this->DBSettings = get_package_object( 'settings::db_settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

00104             function                get_db_setting( &$Manifest )
00105             {
00106                   try
00107                   {
00108                         $SettingName = $Manifest->get_setting( 'setting_name' );
00109                         $DefaultValue = $Manifest->get_setting( 'default_value' , '' );
00110                               
00111                         $SettingValue = $this->DBSettings->get_setting( $SettingName , $DefaultValue );
00112                         
00113                         $SettingValue = $this->Security->get( $SettingValue , 'script' );
00114                         
00115                         return( array( $SettingName , $SettingValue , $Manifest->get_setting( 'label' ) ) );
00116                   }
00117                   catch( Exception $e )
00118                   {
00119                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00120                   }
00121             }

00145             function                get_package_setting( &$Manifest )
00146             {
00147                   try
00148                   {
00149                         $PackageName = $Manifest->get_setting( 'package_name' , false );
00150                         $PackageVersion = $Manifest->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
00151                         $ConfigFileName = $Manifest->get_setting( 'config_file_name' );
00152                         $SettingName = $Manifest->get_setting( 'setting_name' );
00153                         $DefaultValue = $Manifest->get_setting( 'default_value' , '' );
00154                         
00155                         $SettingValue = $Manifest->get_package_setting( 
00156                               $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $ConfigFileName , $SettingName , $DefaultValue 
00157                         );
00158                         
00159                         $SettingValue = $this->Security->get( $SettingValue , 'script' );
00160 
00161                         return( array( $SettingName , $SettingValue , $Manifest->get_setting( 'label' ) ) );
00162                   }
00163                   catch( Exception $e )
00164                   {
00165                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00166                   }
00167             }

00191             function                get_setting( &$Manifest )
00192             {
00193                   try
00194                   {
00195                         $PackageName = $Manifest->get_setting( 'package_name' , false );
00196                         
00197                         if( $PackageName === false )
00198                         {
00199                               return( $this->get_db_setting( $Manifest ) );
00200                         }
00201                         else
00202                         {
00203                               return( $this->get_package_setting( $Manifest ) );
00204                         }
00205                   }
00206                   catch( Exception $e )
00207                   {
00208                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00209                   }
00210             }

00372             function                process_config_line( $ConfigLine )
00373             {
00374                   try
00375                   {
00376                         $Manifest = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00377                         $Manifest->load_settings( $ConfigLine );
00378                         
00379                         list( $SettingName , $SettingValue , $Label ) = $this->get_setting( $Manifest );
00380                         
00381                         switch( $Manifest->get_setting( 'type' , 'input' ) )
00382                         {
00383                               case( 'input' ):
00384                                     return( $this->compile_input_setting( $SettingName , $SettingValue , $Label ) );
00385                                     
00386                               case( 'checkbox' ):
00387                                     return( $this->compile_checkbox_setting( $SettingName , $SettingValue , $Label ) );
00388                                     
00389                               case( 'textarea' ):
00390                                     return( $this->compile_textarea_setting( $SettingName , $SettingValue , $Label ) );
00391                   
00392                               default:
00393                                     $PageComposerUtilities = get_package( 'page::page_composer_utilities' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00394                                     $PageComposerUtilities->add_error_message( 'illegal_setting_type' );
00395                                     return( '' );
00396                         }
00397                   }
00398                   catch( Exception $e )
00399                   {
00400                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00401                   }
00402             }

00422             function                settings_form( $Options )
00423             {
00424                   try
00425                   {
00426                         $FormName = $Options->get_setting( 'form_name' );
00427 
00428                         $ConfigPath = dirname( __FILE__ )."/conf/cf_$FormName";
00429                         if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $ConfigPath ) )
00430                         {
00431                               $Config = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $ConfigPath , 'exploded' );
00432                               
00433                               $this->Output  = '<table id="'.$FormName.'" style="width: 488px; margin: 30px auto;">'.
00434                                                        '<input type="hidden" name="settings_form_action" value="1">';
00435                               foreach( $Config as $i => $ConfigLine )
00436                               {
00437                                     $this->Output .= $this->process_config_line( $ConfigLine );
00438                               }
00439                               $this->Output .= "<tr><td align=\"center\" colspan=\"2\">{href:tpl=std;".
00440                                                        "page=javascript:ultimix.data_form.SubmitDataForm( '#settings_form' );".
00441                                                        "text=save}</td></tr></table>";
00442                         }
00443                         else
00444                         {
00445                               $this->Output = '{lang:tab_manifest_was_not_found}';
00446                         }
00447                   }
00448                   catch( Exception $e )
00449                   {
00450                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00451                   }
00452             }

00477             {
00478                   try

00480                         $Context = get_package( 'gui::context' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00481 
00482                         $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_settings_form' );
00483                         if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return( $this->Output );
00484                         
00485                         return( '' );
00486                   }

00519             function                process_settings( $Str , $Changed )
00520             {
00521                   try
00522                   {
00523                         $BlockParameters = '';
00524                         for( ; $BlockParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'settings' ) ; )
00525                         {
00526                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $BlockParameters );
00527                               $Str = str_replace( 
00528                                     "{settings:$BlockParameters}" , 
00529                                     $this->BlockSettings->get_package_setting( 
00530                                           $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' ) , 
00531                                           $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' ) , 
00532                                           $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'config_file_name' ) , 
00533                                           $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' ) , 
00534                                           $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'default' , '' ) 
00535                                     ) , 
00536                                     $Str
00537                               );
00538                               $Changed = true;
00539                         }
00540                         
00541                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00542                   }
00543                   catch( Exception $e )
00544                   {
00545                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00546                   }
00547             }
00548             
00575             function                process_db_settings( $Str , $Changed )
00576             {
00577                   try
00578                   {
00579                         $BlockParameters = '';
00580                         for( ; $BlockParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'db_settings' ) ; )
00581                         {
00582                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $BlockParameters );
00583                               
00584                               $SettingName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' );
00585                               $DefaultValue = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'default' , '' );
00586                               
00587                               $Value = $this->DBSettings->get_setting( $SettingName , $DefaultValue );
00588                               
00589                               $Str = str_replace( "{db_settings:$BlockParameters}" , $Value , $Str );
00590                               
00591                               $Changed = true;
00592                         }
00593                         
00594                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00595                   }
00596                   catch( Exception $e )
00597                   {
00598                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00599                   }
00600             }
00601             
00632             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00633             {
00634                   try
00635                   {
00636                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_settings( $Str , $Changed );
00637                         
00638                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_db_settings( $Str , $Changed );
00639                         
00640                         return( $Str );
00641                   }
00642                   catch( Exception $e )
00643                   {
00644                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00645                   }
00646             }
